Author: lunarexlipse21
Text: i felt the same way earlier, and it definitely helps to distract yourself, whether that be a tv show or a book or doing a hobby. i struggle with that, too and it’s not easy, but it’s doable if you’re willing to try. your body won’t store fat over one piece of cake, it’s going to be okay. you’re not a failure for having a slice. i’ve also found it helpful to question, where is this thought coming from. then sort of analyze why you’re feeling guilty over eating.   also, i too have a hard time believing this, but you’re not a failure for feeding your body. fighting the ed, it actually proves the opposite, love.  here’s a hug and some good energy ❤️
